metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.code_html:
class Vehicle {
  protected String brand = "Ford";         // Vehicle attribute
  public void honk() {                     // Vehicle method
    System.out.println("Tuut, tuut!");
  }
}

class Car extends Vehicle {
  private String modelName = "Mustang";    // Car attribute
  public static void main(String[] args) {

    // Create a myCar object
    Car myCar = new Car();

    // Call the honk() method (from the Vehicle class) on the myCar object
    myCar.honk();

    // Display the value of the brand attribute (from the Vehicle class) and the value of the modelName from the Car class
    System.out.println(myCar.brand + " " + myCar.modelName);
  }
}

content.text: The extends keyword extends a class (indicates that a class is inherited from another class).
content.html: The extends keyword extends a class (indicates that a class is inherited from another class).

content.text: In Java, it is possible to inherit attributes and methods from one class to another. We group the "inheritance concept" into two categories:
content.html: In Java, it is possible to inherit attributes and methods from one class to another. We group the "inheritance concept" into two categories:

content.text: To inherit from a class, use the extends keyword.
content.html: To inherit from a class, use the extends keyword.

content.text: Read more about inheritance in our Java Inheritance Tutorial .
content.html: Read more about inheritance in our Java Inheritance Tutorial.
